articles.title: Govt must ensure prompt, independent probe into unlawful civilian killings in Kashmir: Amnesty
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: The government must ensure a prompt, independent and impartial investigation into the recent unlawful killings of civilians by armed groups.

articles.title: Indonesia Open: PV Sindhu, Lakshya Sen bow out; Indian challenge ends
articles.description: Double Olympic medallist PV Sindhu and rising star Lakshya Sen made quarterfinal exits in their respective singles events, ending India's challenge in the Indonesia Open Super Series 500 tournament here on Friday.

articles.title: Pakistan to raise taxes on rich, ban some car buying to secure IMF bailout
articles.description: The nation of 220 million people is facing a balance of payments crisis, with foreign reserves falling below $10 billion, hardly enough for 45 days of imports, and a widening current account and ballooning fiscal deficits.

articles.title: Russia and China open cross-border bridge as ties deepen
articles.description: The bridge linking the Russian city of Blagoveshchensk to the Chinese city of Heihe across the Amur river - known in China as Heilongjiang - is just over one kilometre long and cost 19 billion roubles ($342 million), the RIA news agency reported.
articles.content: Russia and China opened a new cross-border bridge in the far east on Friday which they hope will further boost trade as Moscow reels from sweeping Western sanctions imposed over its actions in Ukrain… [+1983 chars]

articles.title: Dow sinks over 550 points after red-hot May inflation data
articles.description: US inflation resurged in May as the consumer price index jumped 8.6 percent compared to 2021, the biggest increase since December 1981, according to government data released Friday.

articles.author: Chittaranjan Tembhekar
articles.title: Maha makes policy for craft wines more liberal
articles.description: To promote agro-processing sector and grape farmers, Maharashtra has made its policy for fruit/flower-based naturally fermented pure wines (made without using synthetic flavours), also called craft wines, more liberal.
